issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead

Using `setJavaScriptEnabled` can introduce XSS vulnerabilities into your application, review carefully
Unnecessary; `SDK_INT` is always >= 27
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `AuthManager` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Prefer `mutableIntStateOf` instead of `mutableStateOf`
